name: Hafiz Zakhilwal
personality: Loyal, disciplined and committed to his job. He is always looking for opportunities to improve and impress his superiors.
story: Hafiz Zakhilwal was born and raised in a small village in Afghanistan. As a young boy, he was fascinated by the military and dreamed of serving his country. He joined the Afghan National Army when he turned 18 and quickly rose through the ranks due to his dedication and hard work. He was recruited by the OPFOR forces due to his special skills in operating tanks and other military vehicles, and has been serving with them ever since.
